## PolygonalTechniqueParams.lineFadeFar property

Distance to the camera (0.0 = nearPlane, 1.0 = farPlane) at which the object edges become transparent. A value of &lt;<!-- -->= 0.0 disables fading.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
lineFadeFar?: DynamicProperty<number>;
```
